Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|まぶた}}
Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=まぶた|目|tr1=ma|t1=eye|pos1=ancient combining form of modern reading ''me''|蓋|tr2=futa|t2=lid}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref>  {{rendaku2|sort=まぶた|futa|buta}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|まなぶた}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=まなぶた|-}}.  Appears in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', completed some time after 759 CE.  Derived as a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=まなぶた|目|tr1=ma|t1=eye|pos1=ancient combining form of modern reading ''me''|な|tr2=na|pos2=old variant of possessive particle {{m|ja|の}} ''no''|蓋|tr3=futa|t3=lid}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>  {{rendaku2|sort=まなぶた|futa|buta}}
